name: PlaySpace ZER0
description:
Try to complete the obstacle course as quickly as possible by using your attractor and repulsor beams to swing through space. Go as fast as you can, but beware: A moment's carelessness will leave you shattered.

WASD: Move

Left Click: Attractor

Right Click: Repulsor

R: Restart

ESC: Quit
